thread.title: Ukraine, Creditors Plan More Debt Talks After Making Progress
thread.title_full: Ukraine, Creditors Plan More Debt Talks After Making Progress - Bloomberg Business

author: Marton Eder
title: Ukraine, Creditors Plan More Debt Talks After Making Progress
text:
Ukraine and its creditors will hold further talks next week after making progress on “substantive issues” regarding the country’s $19 billion restructuring plan, they said in a joint e-mailed statement.
“Parties have agreed to focus their attention on narrowing the gaps,” they said after a meeting in Washington attended by Finance Minister Natalie Jaresko on Wednesday. The further talks will have the “aim of finalizing the terms of Ukraine’s debt operation as soon as possible,” it said.
